glsa.title: CUPS: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in CUPS might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: CUPS, the Common Unix Printing System, is a full-featured print server.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in CUPS concerning the handling of compressed raster files.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All CUPS users should upgrade to the latest version:
